title: What US companies does China need in order to manufacture Huawei smartphones? - Quora

response.answer_text: Without Google Huawei cannot even get their phones booted up, End of story. Even the brand new operating system that Huawei's announced last week, HarmonyOS, actually has Google’s Android operating system at its core so Huawei still needs Google. American parts that Huawei can’t make themselves:Corning glass that covers its front and backFlash storage from MicronNetworking components for 3G, 4G and LTEA variety of small parts that Huawei hasn’t listedARM processorsHuawei’s processors (Kirin) are all ARM designs licensed by ARM which is a western organizationApple is the company that convinced Acorn to dump its failing school computers and focus on licensing its CPUs which consume very little power. This was how Acorn became ARM when Apple purchased 20% of ARM so that ARM had the money to polish and commercialize its CU design.
